Key Match Events: Kane Williamson scored 78* and added 82 runs for the second wicket with Devon Conway
Daryl Mitchell scored 89* off 67 balls, hitting 6 fours and 4 sixes
New Zealand won by 8 wickets with 43 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Kane Williamson left the field retired hurt in the 39th over
Daryl Mitchell smashed six fours and four sixes in his unbeaten 67-ball 89
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rachin Ravindra was dismissed by Mustafizur Rahman in the third over
Mehidy Hasan Miraz dropped Conway at point in the fifth over
Conway and Williamson added 108 runs for the third wicket
